avatar_of_nature.name: Avatar of Nature
avatar_of_nature.scrollmodelrulesdef:
|¨title¨: ¨Forest Walker¨, ¨def¨: ¨Universal Rule

The model gains Strider (Forest). If a unit comprised entirely of models with Forest Walker starts a Round of Combat with more than half of its models with the centre of their bases inside a Forest, then all model parts without Harnessed must reroll to-wound rolls of ‘1’ with their Close Combat Attacks for the duration of that Round of Combat.¨§, |¨title¨: ¨Tree Singing¨, ¨def¨: ¨Universal Rule

Each model with one or more instances of Tree Singing may discard 1 Veil Token once per friendly Magic Phase, immediately after Siphon the Veil. If so, choose a Forest Terrain Feature within 24" of the model with Tree Singing that is not in contact with any unit. Move this Forest in a straight line up to 6". This movement stops immediately before moving into contact with any units or any Terrain Features other than Open Terrain. Each Forest may only be moved with Tree Singing once per Magic Phase.¨§, |¨title¨: ¨Sylvan Spirit¨, ¨def¨: ¨Universal Rule

The model gains Fearless, Magical Attacks, and Exclusive (Sylvan Spirit). ¨§, |¨title¨: ¨Impaling Roots¨, ¨def¨: ¨Shooting Weapon

Range 12", Shots D6+1, Str 4, AP 1, March and Shoot, Quick to Fire, ignores to-hit modifiers from Cover. If its target is in contact with a Forest, the Strength is set to 5 and Armour Penetration to 2.¨§,

blade_dancers.name: Blade Dancers
blade_dancers.scrollmodelrulesdef:
|¨title¨: ¨Forest Walker¨, ¨def¨: ¨Universal Rule

The model gains Strider (Forest). If a unit comprised entirely of models with Forest Walker starts a Round of Combat with more than half of its models with the centre of their bases inside a Forest, then all model parts without Harnessed must reroll to-wound rolls of ‘1’ with their Close Combat Attacks for the duration of that Round of Combat.¨§, |¨title¨: ¨Sylvan Blades¨, ¨def¨: ¨Close Combat Weapon

Paired Weapons. Attacks made with Sylvan Blades gain +1 Armour Penetration.¨§, |¨title¨: ¨Dances of Cenyrn¨, ¨def¨: ¨Universal Rule

At the start of each Round of Combat, units consisting entirely of models with this rule must choose one of the dances listed below and apply its effects until the end of the Round of Combat. The unit cannot choose this dance again until after one of the following has happened:
• The unit is no longer Engaged in Combat.
• The unit has chosen a different dance.¨§,
blade_dancers.endtext: Dance of Whirling Blades+1 Attack Value.Dance of the Parting MistsAegis (3+), -1 Strength, and -1 Armour Penetration.Dance of Biting Wind+1 Armour Penetration and Lethal Strike.Dance of BedevilmentsFear, and enemy units in base contact with the model always have a Rank Bonus of 0.
blade_dancers.scrollendtext: Dance of Whirling Blades+1 Attack Value.Dance of the Parting MistsAegis (3+), -1 Strength, and -1 Armour Penetration.Dance of Biting Wind+1 Armour Penetration and Lethal Strike.Dance of BedevilmentsFear, and enemy units in base contact with the model always have a Rank Bonus of 0.

Range 12", Shots 1, Str 3, AP 1, Quick to Fire.¨§,

heath_riders.scrolloptionalmodelrulesdef:
|¨title¨: ¨Heath Hunters¨, ¨def¨: ¨Universal Rule

The model loses Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP) and Scoring, and gains Sylvan Longbow (3+), Feigned Flight, Light Troops, and Vanguard.¨§, |¨title¨: ¨Sylvan Lance¨, ¨def¨: ¨Close Combat Weapon

Light Lance. Attacks made with a Sylvan Lance gain +1 Armour Penetration.¨§, |¨title¨: ¨Sylvan Longbow¨, ¨def¨: ¨Shooting Weapon

0-55 Models with Sylvan Longbow per Army.

Longbow. Attacks made with a Sylvan Longbow gain Armour Penetration 1 and Quick to Fire. Also, when made from Short Range, they gain Str 4.¨§,

Immediately before shooting with a Sylvan Longbow, all models with Master Archer in a unit may choose to gain either +2 Armour Penetration or +2 to hit until the end of the phase.¨§, |¨title¨: ¨Sylvan Longbow¨, ¨def¨: ¨Shooting Weapon

sylvan_archers.flavour: It is said a Sylvan Archer can hit an apple falling from a tree with an arrow at one-hundred meters. It is a rumour: a Sylvan Elf would never waste an apple.

If a unit comprised entirely of models with Forest Walker starts a Round of Combat with more than half of its models with the centre of their bases inside a Forest, then all model parts without Harnessed must reroll to-wound rolls of ‘1’ with their Close Combat Attacks for the duration of that Round of Combat.¨§, |¨title¨: ¨Emboldening Boughs¨, ¨def¨: ¨Universal Rule

A unit with more than half of its models with Emboldening Boughs gains Stubborn while more than half of the unit's models are inside a Forest with the centre of their bases.¨§, |¨title¨: ¨Sylvan Spirit¨, ¨def¨: ¨Universal Rule

The model gains Fearless, Magical Attacks, and Exclusive (Sylvan Spirit). ¨§,

thicket_shepherd.name: Thicket Shepherd
thicket_shepherd.scrollmodelrulesdef:
|¨title¨: ¨A Shepherd and its Flock¨, ¨def¨: ¨Universal Rule

The model cannot join a unit that contains another model with this rule.¨§, |¨title¨: ¨Forest Walker¨, ¨def¨: ¨Universal Rule
